description: Retrieves a transcript of the session, including details about any attachments. For information about accessing past chat contact transcripts for a persistent chat, see Enable persistent chat. For security recommendations, see Amazon Connect Chat security best practices. If you have a process that consumes events in the transcript of an chat that has ended, note that chat transcripts contain the following event content types if the event has occurred during the chat session: The Amazon Connect Participant Service APIs do not use Signature Version 4 authentication.

parameters.name: StartPosition
parameters.description: A filtering option for where to start. Id (string) --- The ID of the message or event where to start. AbsoluteTime (string) --- The time in ISO format where to start. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z. MostRecent (integer) --- The start position of the most recent message where you want to start.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The ID of the message or event where to start.

nested_params.name: AbsoluteTime
nested_params.description: The time in ISO format where to start. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_params.name: MostRecent
nested_params.description: The start position of the most recent message where you want to start.

parameters.name: ConnectionToken
parameters.description: The authentication token associated with the participant's connection.

nested_items.name: InitialContactId
nested_items.description: The initial contact ID for the contact.

nested_items.name: Transcript
nested_items.description: The list of messages in the session.

nested_items.name: AbsoluteTime
nested_items.description: The time when the message or event was sent.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the message or event.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The type of content of the item.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the item.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of the item: message or event.

nested_items.name: ParticipantId
nested_items.description: The ID of the sender in the session.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The chat display name of the sender.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: The role of the sender. For example, is it a customer, agent, or system.

nested_items.name: Attachments
nested_items.description: Provides information about the attachments.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: Describes the MIME file type of the attachment. For a list of supported file types, see Feature specifications in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: AttachmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the attachment.

nested_items.name: AttachmentName
nested_items.description: A case-sensitive name of the attachment being uploaded.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the attachment.

nested_items.name: MessageMetadata
nested_items.description: The metadata related to the message. Currently this supports only information related to message receipts.

nested_items.name: MessageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the message that contains the metadata information.

nested_items.name: Receipts
nested_items.description: The list of receipt information for a message for different recipients.

nested_items.name: DeliveredTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the message was delivered to the recipient.

nested_items.name: ReadTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the message was read by the recipient.

nested_items.name: RecipientParticipantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the recipient of the message.

nested_items.name: RelatedContactId
nested_items.description: The contactId on which the transcript item was originally sent. This field is only populated for persistent chats when the transcript item is from the past chat session. For more information, see Enable persistent chat.

nested_items.name: ContactId
nested_items.description: The contactId on which the transcript item was originally sent. This field is populated only when the transcript item is from the current chat session.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token. Use the value returned previously in the next subsequent request to retrieve the next set of results.
